About me

I am Dynamic Computer Science graduate with a focus on artificial intelligence and machine learning, eager to contribute learn and grow in the computer engineering track. Proficient in Python programming language and adept at leveraging AI and ML algorithms to tackle complex challenges in the field of AI. Skilled in developing algorithms and data analysis tools to process diverse datasets efficiently. Experienced in implementing machine learning algorithms, including support vector machines (SVM), random forests, and deep learning neural networks, to enable predictive analytics in AI. Capable of extracting insights from large volumes of data. Familiarity with natural language processing algorithms enhances the ability to extract valuable information from unstructured and textual data sources. With a solid foundation in software engineering principles, ready to contribute innovative solutions to enhance data processing and analysis systems.

I am a motivated and experienced Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in Python, development, Django framework, JavaScript, RESTful APIs PHP and the Laravel framework, and a track record of successful project management by a deep comprehension of software development methodologies. My problem-solving acumen, coupled with analytical prowess, empowers me to efficiently address intricate technical challenges. Upholding values of humility, courage, and accountability, I believe in contributing to something greater while steadfastly adhering to ethical principles. With strong interpersonal and communication skills, both written and oral, I foster collaborative environments. As a self-motivated individual capable of independent work, I am poised to make impactful contributions in the dynamic landscape of computer science

What i'm doing

  • Full-Stack web Development

    I design, develop, and maintain both front-end and back-end systems, ensuring seamless communication and functionality for web applications, using a range of technologies and frameworks.

  • Machine Learning

    I create and deploy algorithms that enable computers to learn from and make predictions or decisions based on data, driving innovation across various industries.

  • Data Science

    I analyze complex datasets to extract valuable insights and trends, informing strategic decisions and driving business growth through statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization techniques.

  • Computer Science Trainer

    I educate students or professionals on fundamental and advanced concepts in programming, algorithms, data structures, and software engineering, fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

Experience

  1. Freelance Full-stack Developer

    2020 — Present

    As a freelance full-stack software developer, I specialize in designing and developing web applications, RESTful APIs, and machine learning projects. I leverage my expertise in Python, Django, PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, and other technologies to deliver high-quality solutions tailored to clients' needs. Additionally, I provide programming assistance and support for various projects and assignments.

    Key Responsibilities

    1. Web Application Development - Design and develop custom web applications using Python, Django, PHP, Laravel, and JavaScript. Collaborate with clients to understand requirements, create wireframes, and implement scalable and responsive user interfaces.

    2. RESTful API Development Build RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework and Laravel to enable seamless communication between frontend and backend systems. Implement authentication, authorization, and data serialization for secure and efficient API endpoints.

    3. Machine Learning Projects Develop machine learning models and algorithms using libraries such as TensorFlow and scikit-learn. Apply supervised and unsupervised learning techniques to analyze data, make predictions, and derive insights for clients' business objectives.

    4. Programming Projects and Assignments Provide programming assistance and support for a wide range of projects and assignments. Work closely with clients to troubleshoot issues, optimize code performanc
